meanings.definition: The quality of being finicky or excessively particular
meanings.sent1: Her finickinesses when it comes to choosing a restaurant often leads to indecision.
meanings.sent2: His finickinesses about the cleanliness of his workspace can be quite annoying to his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The cat's finickinesses about the brand of food it eats is starting to become a running joke in the household.
meanings.sent4: The finickinesses of the fashion designer were compared to those of a perfectionist artist.
meanings.sent5: The finickinesses of the chef were evident in the intricate presentation of each dish.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly concerned with minor details or trivial matters
meanings.sent1: The finickinesses of the event planner were evident in the precise placement of each decoration.
meanings.sent2: Her finickinesses about the font size on the presentation slides delayed the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The finickinesses of the teacher about the arrangement of desks in the classroom sometimes amused the students.
meanings.sent4: His finickinesses about the order of books on the shelf was compared to a librarian's attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The finickinesses of the architect were reflected in the intricate designs of the building.
